problemStatement.title: Youth Disengagement
problemStatement.description: Young people feel disconnected from government processes that affect their daily lives

problemStatement.title: Accessibility Gap
problemStatement.description: Budget information is buried in technical documents, written for experts, not citizens

problemStatement.title: Format Mismatch
problemStatement.description: Young Kenyans consume content on mobile, but budget info is designed for print

problemStatement.title: Accountability Void
problemStatement.description: There's no easy way to track if promised projects actually happen

mission: To empower young Kenyans with accessible, engaging information about public budgets and to create platforms for meaningful civic participation that drives accountability.

values.title: Clarity First
values.description: We explain complex government spending in plain, simple language

values.title: Truth Above All
values.description: We verify facts rigorously and present evidence-based stories

values.title: Non-Partisan
values.description: We don't push political agendas. We focus on facts and accountability

values.title: Youth-Centered
values.description: Everything we create is designed with and for young people

values.title: Inclusive
values.description: We ensure marginalized voices are heard and represented
